If all cooking equipment disappeared, I would use a portable camping stove and cook food over an open flame.
I would use a pressure cooker to make a one-pot meal with rice, vegetables, and protein.
I would use a slow cooker to make a hearty soup or stew with ingredients that don't require cooking, such as canned beans and vegetables.
I would use a grill to cook meat and vegetables outdoors.
I would use a microwave to heat up pre-cooked meals or make simple snacks like popcorn or toast.
